segments.text: Is there a bus that'll go all the way to Sons from PHS ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Sons on Fair Oaks and Orange Grove .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're going to need to take two buses to get to that Sons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which buses will I have to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , you need to get on the 268 going west .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to get off on Fair Oaks and Washington .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Get on the 261 , and it'll take you the rest of the way to Sons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all there is to it .
segments.speaker: S2
